des:
This is simply a Quran radio skill that's free to use! 

Fill your house and care and everywhere with Alexa with Quran. You don't have to worry about which surah to play, you just simply play the skill and it will continuously play Quran until you stop it.

---------------------------------------------
# Create a Routine!
A great idea is to use Alexa Routine to schedule the Quran to play early in the morning. It is a great way to wake up!
To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1. Open your Alexa App.
2. Select Routines.
3. Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
4. Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5. Choose 'Quran Station'. Done.
---------------------------------------------
